name: title
label: Game title
description: This is the title of the game you are creating.

name: background
label: Board background
description: Select a suitable background image for your board game.

name: size
label: Board size
description: Specifiy how much space (in px) the board game should take up. The aspect ratio should match the one of your background image.

fields.name: text
fields.label: Welcome and instruction text
fields.placeholder: Greetings young traveler! Are you ready to test your knowledge about the arctic?
fields.description: Explain what the user should do and what the point of the game is.

fields.name: startButtonText
fields.label: Button text
fields.description: Label of the button the user has to press to start the game.

name: hotspots
label: Hotspots
description: Hotspots are mini-games that are placed on the board. E.g. Quiz, Hangman.

fields.name: image
fields.label: Hotspot image
fields.description: Image used on the board for users to idenitify the hotspot.

fields.name: passedImage
fields.label: Hotspot image - Passed
fields.description: The hotspot image will changed to this once the user has completed a minigame and passed.

fields.name: failedImage
fields.label: Hotspot image - Failed
fields.description: The hotspot image will change to this if the user fails.

fields.name: coords
fields.label: Hotspot position
fields.description: Position the hotspot on the game board by using coordinates in pixels.

fields.name: action
fields.label: Action
fields.description: Choose the minigame to start when the user chooses this hotspot.

fields.name: images
fields.description: Select images to use as a progress indicator. One for each progress step plus one for no answers given yet.

fields.name: coords
fields.label: Progress indicator position
fields.description: Position the progress indicator on the board using pixel coordinates.

fields.name: video
fields.label: Finished video
fields.description: Video to play before the game results are shown.

fields.name: skipButtonText
fields.label: Skip button text
fields.description: Label for the button the user has to press to skip the finished video.

fields.name: text
fields.label: Result text
fields.description: The text explaining the game score. Variables: @score, @total, @percentage.

fields.name: retryButtonText
fields.label: Retry button text
fields.description: Label for the button the user has to press to start over.

fields.name: solutionButtonText
fields.label: Show solutions button
fields.description: Label for the button the user has to press to view the solutions.
